strings:
<voice_0x01000B2D><se_low>King Trode: Ah, there you are!
I've been waiting for you.
<voice_0x01000B2E><se_low>King Trode: I hope you haven't forgotten about the alchemy pot! You really should give it a try.

<voice_0x01000B2F><se_low>King Trode: What's that?
You say you don't know what to make?
<voice_0x01000B30><se_low>King Trode: Well, I'm sure you'll come across some recipes as we travel from place to place.

<voice_0x01000B31><se_low>King Trode: Why don't we have a look inside your bag...
Well, well! You already have enough items to make some very interesting things!
<voice_0x01000B32><se_low>King Trode: Just try mixing some ingredients and see what you come up with. Practice makes perfect!

<voice_0x01000B33><se_low>King Trode: Use the Miscellaneous Menu to open the
Alchemy Pot screen. Give it a try!

<voice_0x01000B34><se_low>King Trode: Well, I'm sure you'll find some recipes as we
travel around. Keep your eyes peeled!

<voice_0x01000B35><se_low>King Trode: Let's have a look inside your bag...
Hm, you don't seem to have enough items
to make anything just yet.
<voice_0x01000B36><se_low>King Trode: Why don't you have another look around Peregrin Quay and see if you can find any recipes?

<voice_0x01000B37><se_low>King Trode: Well, go on, then!
Look around and see what you can find.
<voice_0x01000B38><se_low>King Trode: Ah, I see you've returned!

<voice_0x01000B39><se_low>King Trode: Well? If the look on your face is anything to
go by, you seem to have found a recipe for the alchemy pot.

<voice_0x01000B3A><se_low>King Trode: That means you can get started right away!
Give it a try! Practice makes perfect!

<voice_0x01000B33><se_low>King Trode: Use the Miscellaneous Menu to open the
alchemy pot screen. Give it a try!
<voice_0x01000B3B><se_low>King Trode: Still short of recipes, eh?
<voice_0x01000B3C><se_low>King Trode: You can't just ignore it, you know. It's far too important. You have to master it, otherwise we'll have a hard time later on.
<voice_0x01000B3D><se_low>King Trode: So go back to Peregrin Quay and have another look around.

<voice_0x01000B3E><se_low>King Trode: Chin up! Don't despair!
Now get to it!
